displacementText.playerSelf: You take off the Stormtrooper Armor.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s Stormtrooper Armor and start to tear it apart piece by piece.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your Stormtrooper Armor and starts to tear it apart piece by piece.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s Stormtrooper Armor starts to tear it apart piece by piece.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put on the Stormtrooper Armor.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put the Stormtrooper Armor on [npc.name]'s body.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the Stormtrooper Armor onto [npc.her] body.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] equips you with the Stormtrooper Armor.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces the Stormtrooper Armor onto your body.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the Stormtrooper Armor onto [npc2.name]'s body.

displacementText.playerSelf: You shift the Stormtrooper Armor to the side.
displacementText.playerNPC: You shift [npc.name]'s Stormtrooper Armor to the side.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name] and start to tear off the pieces of [npc.her] Stormtrooper Armor.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] shifts [npc.her] Stormtrooper Armor to the side.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] shifts your Stormtrooper Armor to the side.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of you and starts to tear off the pieces of your Stormtrooper Armor.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] shifts [npc2.name]'s Stormtrooper Armor to the side.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name] and starts to tear off the pieces of [npc2.her]'s Stormtrooper Armor.

replacementText.playerSelf: You shift your Stormtrooper Armor back into place.
replacementText.playerNPC: You shift [npc.name]'s Stormtrooper Armor back into place.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you shift back [npc.her] Stormtrooper Armor into place.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] shifts [npc.her] Stormtrooper Armor back into place.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] shifts back your Stormtrooper Armor into place.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] shifts back your Stormtrooper Armor into place.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] shifts [npc2.name]'s Stormtrooper Armor back into place.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] grabs hold [npc2.name] and starts to shift back [npc2.her] Stormtrooper Armor back into place.
